sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Text, Button, HStack, Box, Avatar, AvatarBadge, Image, useColorModeValue } from '@chakra-ui/core'
import { MdBookmarkBorder, MdControlPoint } from 'react-icons/md'
import {BsClipboardData, BsBell} from 'react-icons/bs'

export const Header = () => {
  // * #1A202C
  const navigationBarBg = useColorModeValue("white", "#1A202C")
  const navigationBarColor = useColorModeValue("rgba(38, 38, 38, 1)", "white")
  const navigationBarBorderBottom = useColorModeValue("rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.9)", "rgba(36, 36, 36, 1)")

  return (
    <Box borderBottom={`1px solid ${navigationBarBorderBottom}`} fontSize="sm" fontWeight="450" color={navigationBarColor}  bg={navigationBarBg}>
      <Box d="flex" justifyContent="space-between" flexWrap="nowrap" minW="992px" maxW="1200px" w="100%" mx="auto" px="20px" py="5px" position="relative">
        <HStack spacing="30px">
          <Text cursor="pointer" _hover={{ textColor: 'rgba(34, 34, 34, 1)', fontWeight: 400}}>探索</Text>
          <Text cursor="pointer" _hover={{ textColor: 'rgba(34, 34, 34, 1)', fontWeight: 400}}>题库</Text>
          <Text cursor="pointer" _hover={{ textColor: 'rgba(34, 34, 34, 1)', fontWeight: 400}}>讨论</Text>
          <Text cursor="pointer" _hover={{ textColor: 'rgba(34, 34, 34, 1)', fontWeight: 400}}>竞赛</Text>
          <Text cursor="pointer" _hover={{ textColor: 'rgba(34, 34, 34, 1)', fontWeight: 400}}>企业</Text>
        </HStack>
        <HStack spacing="30px">
          <Button size="sm" leftIcon={<MdBookmarkBorder />} colorScheme="teal" variant="outline" cursor="pointer">下载App</Button>
          <Button size="sm" leftIcon={<MdControlPoint />} colorScheme="yellow" variant="outline" cursor="pointer">Plus会员</Button>
          {/* FIXME: hover not working for the icon */}
          <Box _hover={{color: "blue", stroke: 'blue'}}>
            <BsClipboardData size={18} cursor="pointer" color="rgba(140, 140, 140, 1)"/>
          </Box>
          <Box _hover={{color: "rgba(89, 89, 89, 1)"}}>
            <BsBell size={18} cursor="pointer" color="rgba(140, 140, 140, 1)" />
          </Box>
          <Avatar size="xs" cursor="pointer"><AvatarBadge boxSize="1em" bg="green.500" /></Avatar>
        </HStack> 
        <Image src="https://assets.leetcode-cn.com/support/new.svg" alt="new feature" position="absolute" right="450px" top="-9px" cursor="pointer" transition="all 0.3s" _hover={{ top: "-3px" }}/>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}
